CustomField.description: Controls the behaviour of Consignment Search request message. If unchecked, then Action in the request body will be set to "Level1". The response will include only Consignment Details, Article Details, Subdockets and Book-In Notes. if this field is checked, then the response will also include all Scan Events of Consignment and Articles and last 5 POD images.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Should the Consignment Search Response contain Scan Events and PODs?
CustomField.label: Get All Consignment Details
